Research Experience

Research Assistant

  • Data analysis on Terabytes of data
  • Use monte carlo simulations and fitting routines to separate signal from a background model
  • Utilize HTCondor to extract data from the Large Hadron Collider

Northwestern University

Research Assistant

June 2015 - June 2018

  • Planned, designed and built bench top experimental set-up for atom and ion trapping
  • Built custom electronics for reliable operation of the ion/atom trapping experiment (ex. PID Controllers for laser power and temperature stability)
  • Designed and built custom optical systems that increased light capture from 1% to 4% for shorter integration times.
  • Programmed control software with millisecond accuracy in Labview and Python PyQt5 module

Universit of Rochester

Research Experience for Undergraduates(REU)

June 2015 - June 2018

  • I replicated results obtained by Dr. Kwiat and others from University of Illinois, Urbana Champaign. I needed to engineer a polarization entangled state, which a graduate student would use for a quantum enigma machine demonstration.

Swiss Federal Institute of Technology(ETH)

Undergraduate researcher

2012 - 2013 (1 Semester)

  • I studied the behavior of the bandgap voltage under proton and gamma radiation for the CMS digital pixel module. I also compared the behavior of two new implementations of the bandgap circuit with the old one.

Paul Scherrer Institut (PSI)

Undergraduate researcher

2010 - 2013 (3 Summers)

  • My study analyzed the cooling performance of two thermal conducting pastes. I calibrated and used several Resistant Temperature Devices to measure the temperature distribution as a function of power on the CMS Pixel Barrel Module.
  • Design a warning system for when the CMS cooling performs under hazardous conditions. I analyzed the optical transmission of a light source through a cooling pipe and designed an algorithm that measures the water vapor fraction. By accounting intensity differences on the signal, the system was able to identify changes in phases between liquid and gas.
